Integrated Caching

Integrated Caching Configuration. The Integrated Caching feature is used to cache static and dynamic web application data.

cachecontentgroup

Configuration for Integrated Cache content group

cacheforwardproxy

Configuration for forward proxy

cacheglobal_binding


cacheglobal_cachepolicy_binding


cacheobject

Configuration for cache object

cacheparameter

Configuration for cache parameter

cachepolicy

Configuration for Integrated Cache policy

cachepolicy_binding

Binding object showing the resources that can be bound to cachepolicy

cachepolicy_cacheglobal_binding

Binding object showing the cacheglobal that can be bound to cachepolicy

cachepolicy_cachepolicylabel_binding

Binding object showing the cachepolicylabel that can be bound to cachepolicy

cachepolicy_csvserver_binding

Binding object showing the csvserver that can be bound to cachepolicy

cachepolicy_lbvserver_binding

Binding object showing the lbvserver that can be bound to cachepolicy

cachepolicylabel

Configuration for cache policy label

cachepolicylabel_binding

Binding object showing the resources that can be bound to cachepolicylabel

cachepolicylabel_cachepolicy_binding

Binding object showing the cachepolicy that can be bound to cachepolicylabel

cachepolicylabel_policybinding_binding

Binding object showing the policybinding that can be bound to cachepolicylabel

cacheselector

Configuration for cache selector
